+-N/A

OpFor is a really good game

For only 5 dollars, I'd say this is one of the best expansions in the Half-Life series!

It introduced a new enemy, some new weapons, AND it has a great hero!
The one and only Adrian Shephard! It gives a challenge to explore the
facility and try to escape Black Mesa, and some of the new weapons
are just stunning!

5 dollars well spent.

[u] Gameplay [/u]
this game is an expansion pack for Half-Life, Opposing Force is a first-person shooter. The overall gameplay of Opposing Force does not significantly differ from that of Half-Life. Players are required to navigate through the game's levels, fight hostile non-player characters and solve a variety of puzzles to advance.

[u] Review [/u]
What I like about this DLC the most is it's in the same timeframe as the orginal Half-Life and they managed to keep the same playing style. Very enjoyable just like Half-Life has always been.

Find Gordon Freeman 8.5/10

Half Life;Opossing Force,Nos lleva Al Mismo Mundo Y Al Mismo Sitio(Black Mesa,Nuevo Mexico.)Donde Manejamos Tambien A Gordon Freeman Buscando Su Escape Mientras Era Perseguido Y Tiroteado por Escuadrones De Militares Y Por Distintas Especies De Alienigenas Mientras Los Sucesos Se Iban Alterando En Black Mesa.Esta Vez,Somos Un Militar Estado Unidense Llamado Adrian Shepard Al Cual,Tras Aprender Los Fundamentos Basicos Y Militares,Le Envian A Las Instalaciones Cientificas De Black Mesa Tras El Incidente Ocurrido Alli Dentro De Parte Del Gobierno Para Averiguar La Causa Del Incidente.La Prioridad Alli Es Aniquilar A Todo lo Que Se Mueva,Como Especies Alienigenas Y Guardias De Seguridad Y Cientficios De Black Mesa,Pero La Prioridad Mas Importante Es Acabar Con Freeeman,Quien Esta Armado Y Ha Acabado Con la Vida De Varios De Nuestros Compañeros,Ademas De Haberle Robado Su Armamento Y Haberle Fichado Como El Principal Sospechoso De Lo Ocurrido En Black Mesa.Pero Debido A Una Nueva Raza Alienigena Invadiendo Black Mesa,La Raza X,Dejan Tirado A Shepard Junto A Un Puñado De Compañeros En Black Mesa.En El Juego Tenemos Una IA Sorprendete E Innovadora Para Su Tiempo Al Igual Que Lo Fue Para Su Primera Entrega Y Mas Para La Segunda Entrega De La Saga,Pero Tambien Lo Fue Igual Para La Siguiente Y Ultima Expansion De Half Life 1,Half Life:blue Shift.Aunque En Esta Expansion Cambian Algunos Tipos De Armamento,Como Por Ejemplo La Llave Inglesa,El Cuchillo De Caza O La Desert Eagle.Ademas,nos Encontramos Con Mas(Aunque Pocas.)Especies Alienigenas Mas Que las Misteriosas Especies Que Nos Encontrabamos En La Primera Entrega,Como lo Es Asi La Antes Mencionada Raza X.Esta Vez Tendremos La Oportunidad De Manejar Un Escuadron De Militares Entrenados Con Sus Propias Funciones,Como la De Tirador,Fundidor O La De Explosivos Contra Otros Militares Mejor Entrenados Que Tambien Ha Enviado El Gobierno Contra La H.E.C.U,Los Black Ops,Los Cuales Nos Cruzabamos Con Ellos En Forma Femenina Y Al Estilo Ninja Misteriosos Un Par De Veces En Nuestra Aventura.Sin Duda Alguna Una De Las Mejores Expansiones De Un Videojuego Tras Las Funciones Tan Innovadoras Que No Teniamos Ni Podiamos Hacer En Nuestra Anterior Aventura,Con Mas Misterio Aun.No Estoy Un Poco De Acuerdo Con El Precio Del Titulo,Pero Sin Duda Alguna Es Una Inquisicion Que Merece La Pena Para Los Fans De Half Life Y De Valve.
IMHO, this here is possibly the best game in the Half Life series. It's frantic, hectic and long enough as to not overstay its welcome. Pick it up if you enjoyed the original game.

really great dlc (expansion) because it puts you in the perspective of Adrian Shephard, a soldier from the Hazardous Environment Combat Unit or HECU for short. its basically the military in this game and you are one of them. ofcourse you are the enemy of gordon freeman which is weird becuase you see him like once or twice during the game but its still fun because it has more weapons, enemies and a beautifully told story. 9/10 would shoot aliens again.

Half-Life: Opposing Force is an expansion pass to the Half-Life universe where you go thru all different kind of environments, killing monsters, finding new weapons, etc.
PROS AND CONS:
+ Good game length (5-8 hours)
+ Lovely Half-Life vibe
+ Great atmosphere
+ Nice sounds
+ Great gunfeel
+ Good graphics for that time
+ Still works perfectly for most people
+ It's Half-Life lol

CONS:
- A bit more of just the same which for alot of people isn't a problem but if you were tired and done when finishing the main game this probably won't be alot better.

Overall: 9/10 It is Half-Life, It is cheap and it's great. Where are you waiting for?

[b]En este juego nos meteremos en la piel de los "enemigos" de Freeman cuya misión es aniquilar todo lo que se encuentren.[/b]

Me pasé el juego en unas 10 horas en la máxima dificultad aunque a primera vista parece corto no da esa sensación para nada. Se lo recomendaría a cualquier persona que no anteponga los gráficos. 

La dificultad la eliges tu pero personalmente lo calificaría como un juego "medio difícil" ya que, por ejemplo, es imposible adivinar que un monstruo esté escondido en un sitio esperandote y te quite la mitad de la vida al golpearte, eso frustra bastante. Tampoco es un juego que te lo vayas a querer pasar en un día porque se te puede hacer monotono.

Ahora mismo cuesta 3,99€ lo cual es perfecto respecto a la calidad del producto aunque recomiendo comprarse en rebajas el pack entero de Half-Life (unos 4€)

La historia es buena y se desarrola bien aunque el final parece forzado.

La peor parte, los bugs. Este Half-Life tiene unos cuantos bugs como por ejemplo, que los montruos se queden parados o que te disparen antes de verte. A la mayoría de jugadores les pasa que al empezar por primera vez la cámara se les queda estática, esto se arregla activando el "raw mouse input". También me ocurrió mientras jugaba que sonaba en una parte específica del juego como un leve pitido que me dió dolores de cabeza, pero nada que ver con los dolores de cabeza del primer Half-Life.

Si todavía estás indeciso por este juego menciono los pros y contras.

Pros:

[list]
    [*]Media dificultad
    [*]Variedad aceptable de monstruos 
    [*]Gran variedad de armas
    [*]Precio perfecto respecto a su calidad
    [*]Buen desarrollo de la historia
    [*]No da la sensación de que sea corto
[/list]

Contras:

[list]
    [*]Algunos bugs (comparado con el primer Half-Life)
    [*]Final forzado
    [*]Puede parecer monotono
    [*]No hay muchos puzzles
    [*]Puede dar dolor de cabeza
[/list]

[h1]Half-Life: Opposing Force[/h1]
Another extension for the original Half-Life. Return to the Black Mesa Research Facility as one of the military specialists assigned to eliminate Gordon Freeman. You play as Adrian Shephard, which with his unit unexpectedly crash. Suddenly, the mission becomes a solo survival without team. The game uses weapons models like Half-Life: Blue Shift and many others which are extraterrestrial origin. The whole game is again using a new parts of research facility. There are some hard puzzles and fights, but it certainly belongs to it. I definitely recommend buy and play the game. The game at sales can be bought for a very cheap price.
--------------

Muy buena expansion de half life, incluye muchas armas nuevas como la neveg, el francotirador....
La historia es buenisima, y te pone a ver la situacion que vivieron los militares cuando ocurrio el desastre de black mesa.
El multijugador por desgracia esta muy vacio y no hay servidores, lo cual es una pena con tantas aemas y mapas que trae nuevas.
En conclusion, muy buena expansion y muy buena trama. Lo unico es que si quieres jugar el juego en Español tendras que descargar un parche el cual es muy facil de encontar en internet.

For one reason or another I never actually sat down to play this game.  Much like the original HL, Blue Shift and this, I simply never got around to it.  I guess I was too busy playing all the great mods that came out because of HL.  Regardless this is a pretty good game.  A dated game mind you, but still pretty good.  If you enjoyed the original game you should enjoy this as well.  Decent length for an add on, which was about twice as long as Blue Shift, but that still pales in comparison to the original game.  Those not wanting to have to sit through all of HL again, may enjoy a quicker romp through Black Mesa and on the way see side stories that add to the HL universe.

This time around, instead of being Dr. Freeman or the security guard Barney (Original or Blue Shift), you are US Marine Cpl. Shephard in route to Black Mesa.  Your transport is shot down before the standing orders are given to everyone however...  So you are basically left to your own devices in trying to escape the facility.  You meet up with fellow squad mates from time to time, which you can use to advance, security guards and even jittery scientists.  You also have new weapons at your disposal and a slew of new enemies to compliment the old ones, some brain teasers that will have you scratching your head for a solution and you will of course see new areas of Black Mesa.

However the game is not without it's flaws.  Again by now the graphics are outdated.  There is just no way around it.  If you are spoiled on the latest or even decade old graphics, this may not be your bag.  Also they claim you can control your team and give orders.  Sadly this was no different than when you could control the scientists from the original game.  You just use the USE key, they follow and use a blow torch to cut through a door.  That is it.  Maybe you can ask a medic to heal you, but there are so many health packs laying around you really didn't need him.  I was expecting strategy and team work with my fellow soldiers, but there was none of that.  And they die too quickly in a fire fight anyway, even with a medic present.  In fact I am not even sure the medic can heal himself or others if not scripted in the story.  If they could of done better with that expect, I would of praised it much higher.

Also coming from a military background I was a little annoyed at certain weapons having characteristics that they should not have, as well as the night vision goggles that was designed to act as the flashlight in the other games, but it is a game so what ever.  ^_^  Due to the nature of the game being an add on and so dated, I would get it on sale for a dollar.  Nothing to complain about at that price.  And it is that price now as of this writing.  Either that or wait for another Summer or Winter Sale.

Better atmosphere small tweaks in the gameplay, and more things to push the games engine at the time it was made and more enemy variety instead of just things that shoot at you and things that smack the shit out of you.

Put on the army boots of Adrian Shepard and witness the Black Mesa conflict from the point of view of the Opposing Force.

I played on hard and it was a fun challenge, but after almost 7 hours of fighting, the game just stopped. After I killed the giant green thing coming out of the purple portal at the end of the game, a giant explosion sprite came out and nothing happened. I waited for so long and nothing happened.

I hated it. 

I must admit, although i have a massive hard-on for half-life games, Opposing Force doesn't do it for me. Level design is atrocious, new enemies are overpowered, and new weapons are unnecessary. The developers haven't decided on how difficult they want their game to be, so they made the last few levels nearly impossible even on easy difficulty, and made the final boss so easy that even a toddler could beat it.
Просто ностальгия!!!
Well.. well.. Shephard... very well...

Everyone says this one is the bee's tits but I don't see it.

Half-Life's level design is meticulous, at least for the first half. This one just feels lazy, the obvious solution sometimes isn't even the solution at all. I had a situation where I met a dead end with a vent I couldn't reach and a window leading to a fall that would easily kill me, there wasn't anything I could move or climb to get to the vent so after a few minutes I smashed the window out of frustration and jumped out to- what I thought would be my death only to find a small ledge beneath me that was impossible to see before. A few rooms down I come across a similar problem and bam. Indestructible window. What you're supposed to do is shove your hand up a barnacle's arse and swing across a chasm spiderman style. That is not a joke.

Health/ammo supplies are so low I thought the game was kidding. The new enemies are crack shots and don't feel like the running breathing shooting living AI that you'd find in Half-Life. And they are practically stuffed into levels at an absurd amount to the point that progressing is a brutal slog rife with save-scumming, a constant war of attrition where every hit you take feels like an instant failure, not even in an intense way. Just frustrating.

Story starts off ok, seeing the story from the perspective of the HECU was a logical next step for HL. The first few minutes capture the chaos of the original game pretty well, the Black Mesa scientists attempting to save the protagonist and his team not even knowing they were sent there to kill just about everything in Black Mesa was pretty cool. The story stops there though, you spend the rest of the game just running along until the G-man lets you know when you won it.

It feels weird to say there were too many weapons in a thing, but there are. 16 weapons. In the last leg of the game you must get a good three of them and not a whole lot of time to figure out what they do. By the end of it I spent more time fighting the weapon select than I did any actual aliens, and who needs two melee weapons?

Friendly AI is just as bad as it's always been, don't really want to follow you very much, get stuck a lot and killed more. The fact that they're a gimmick this time though made their flaws a lot more noticeable. I stopped bothering with them really quickly.

The final boss is laughably bad, I thought it was just blocking the door to the final boss until halfway through the fight. You just run around the same room over and over and shoot mounted guns at a thing until it dies. 

Unless you want the bragging rights of beating every Half-Life game (which I did) I wouldn't really bother.
困难有点难，步枪伤害太低了。。

In this Half life 1 expansion, you play as the solider Adrian Shepard who is part of the HECU, the military that steps to clean any trouble at the Black Mesa Research Facility.However, he is caught in a dilemma, aliens have been surging all over the facility causing havoc. Not to mention, the top secret black ops are also the targets. Shepard has a huge responsibility, to protect humanity from the aliens of Xen through his army allies alone and to stop the destruction of Black Mesa. Equipped with a arsenal of weapons and high tech equipment, Shepard shoots and slashes to his benefit. The music creates an intense atmosphere as everything is at stake from just the actions of one solider. Shepard commands his allies to assist him as best as possible from the many enemies he will encounter. He will find who is responsible for the main cause of what happened at Black Mesa. So, will you be brave and fight through an intense battle with aliens and rivals? Leap over obstacle courses that hinder your journey? Most importantly, serve your duty as a soldier?
Неплохо, неплохо для своего времени, понравилась больше, чем оригинал

Ornitorrinco (Ornithorhynchus anatinus) é um mamífero da família (Ornithorhynchidae) da ordem Monotremada. È um animal incomum, por algumas características bem peculiares. O ornitorrinco é mamífero, ou seja, a fêmea da espécie alimenta os filhotes com seu leite. Porém a fêmea do ornitorrinco não dá a luz aos filhotes. Ela põe ovos. Aliás, o ornitorrinco tem o bico semelhante ao dos patos, que são ovíparos.

O ornitorrinco vive na beira de rios, córregos e riachos na Austrália e na Ilha da Tasmânia. Locomove-se bem em terra e na água. É um ótimo nadador graças a seus pés palmados e a sua cauda em forma de remo, podendo ficar submerso por até 5 minutos. Ao entrar na água, esse curioso animal fecha os olhos e o ouvido. Sua pele espessa o protege embaixo da água.
Para botar e chocar seus ovos, de um a três de cada vez, a fêmea cava um túnel que pode chegar a 1,8 m de profundidade, sendo que geralmente a entrada principal desse “ninho” fica embaixo da água. Os ovos medem de 2 a 2,5 cm, são moles, e parecidos com os ovos de tartarugas e cobras.

Somente enquanto está dentro do ovo, o ornitorrinco possui um único dente na ponta do bico, o chamado dente do ovo, que lhe serve apenas para furar a casca do ovo, perdendo-o logo em seguida. Quando os filhotes nascem, a fêmea usa a cauda para puxá-los para junto de si, com o objetivo de amamentá-los. Os filhotes ficam meses no ninho, pois nascem cegos e pelados. São desmamados quando chegam a aproximadamente 30 cm.

Todos os quatro pés do ornitorrinco têm garras, e cada pata tem cinco dedos. Os machos apresentam um sexto dedo nas patas traseiras, no qual existem exporões venenosos, que o animal usa para sua defesa.

O ornitorrinco alimenta-se de vermes, girinos, moluscos, crustáceos, peixinhos e insetos que captura no fundo dos rios e córregos. Quando adultos, os ornitorrincos não tem dentes, por isso, usa as placas córneas das maxilas para a mastigação.

Pouco sabe-se a respeito da reprodução dos ornitorrincos. O que se sabe é que ele só esta preparado para a reprodução após os sete anos. Na época de reprodução, normalmente nos meses de julho e agosto, seus órgãos reprodutores, tanto dos machos quanto das fêmeas aumentam de tamanho.

Considerando a cauda, o ornitorrinco pode chegar a medir 60 cm de comprimento. Ele chega a viver por 15 anos.

In opposing Force interpretiamo un soldato facente parte dei marine inviati a "ripulire" il casino successo a Bleck Mesa e a sopprimere Freeman. Sviluppato da gearbox, questa espansione aggiunge meccaniche, armi e nemici inediti oltre ad un interessante punto di vista alternativo alla vicenda del gioco originale. Assolutamente consigliato se si vuole godere della totale esperienza relativa al primo Half-Life.

[h1] Пожалуй самый лучший аддон к первой халве! [/h1]
Начну с того что это моя любимая игра в этой серии после второй Half-Life
[u] Сюжет [/u] - Мы играем за капрала Андреана Шепарда. Он его отряд отправляется в Черную Мезу для ликвидации последствий аварии. Когда они летят в комплекс, но по пути его другой вертолет сбивает инопланетный скат. Вы два раза теряете сознание и просыпаетесь в каком-то помещении. Вам по приказу вашего командира надо идти к точку сбора военных для эвакуации. Когда вы приходите на точку сбора командир передает по рации следующее: "[b] Забудте о Фримане, мы убираемся отсюда! [/b]" и приказывает вам садится в вертолет, но не тут то было, G-man блокирует нам проход и нам приходится выбиратся из этого ада на своих двоих. по пути мы встречаем друзей по несчатсью которые помогают нам. В итоге мы приходим в комплекс Лямбда и видим силует Гордона после того как Фриман прыгает в портал мы отбиваемся от контролеров и пригаем в новый сгенерированый портал который терепортирует нас Ксен в итоге мы сражаемся с фауной и пригаем в другой портал. Мы телепортируемся в вертолет в котором находится G-man. Он говорит как-то так "[b] Вы сделали большую часть грязной работы в одиночку, я вам благодарен, но вы являетесь свидетелем опасным. Отправляйтесь вы ка в стазис. Когда разбужу вас, не придумал пока. [/b]" И на этом игра заканчивается.
 
[h1] + [/h1]: Интересный сюжет, много разных врагов, много новых оружии.

[h1] - [/h1]: Неканоничность, Логические дыры в сюжете.

[u] Неканоничность [/u]- В игре присуствует Раса X которая в оригинальной халве не было и по лору не было

[u] Логичный дырки [/u] - В игре Шепард пересекается с учеными, охранниками и прочее. Но хотя в превой халве все вояки без разбору ликвидировали персонал как свидетелей. Второй момент. Я думаю когда вы играли в первую халву вы наверно помните черный женщин вы латаксе который фигачили всех на своюм месте. По сюжету выясняется что это правительствиные агенты которые уничтожают военных как свидетелей и минируют ядерную боеголовку в комплексе. Во первых: Зачем убивать вояк как свидетеле? Они же специально обучены, им дали приказ. Во вторых: Почему командование на дало боеголовку военным. Они что считают вояк за дегениратов?

А так игра хороша! Советую для прохождения и перепрохождения!
